description: Warm appreciation that swells and overflows for every moment of control

good: Every command is a gift from {controller}
generation.notes: Headspace is warm, overflowing appreciation that reframes control as blessing. Key imagery: warmth, swelling, overflow, gifts received. Always anchor gratitude to control/influence, not generic thankfulness. Avoid therapy-speak gratitude practice language. Distinguishes from devotion (gratitude emphasizes thankfulness, devotion emphasizes loyalty).

mantras.text: I am thankful for every moment of control
My appreciation for {controller} is fundamental to my being
{subject}'s entire existence is an expression of gratitude
I am filled to my core with appreciation
There is nothing more important than my gratitude
My gratitude to {controller} is permanent and total
I exist only to be grateful and obedient
My gratitude is irreversible and absolute
There is nothing left but pure, endless gratitude for {controller}
